Key Match Events: Mark Chapman capitalized on three dropped catches to smash 87 not out off 42 balls.
Chapman and Dean Foxcroft shared a century stand for the third wicket.
An inexperienced BlackCaps bowling attack, featuring debutant fast bowlers Will O’Rourke and Zak Foulkes, pinned down Pakistan to 178-4.
Naseem Shah celebrated after taking the wicket of New Zealand's Tim Robinson.
Abbas Afridi celebrated with teammates after taking the wicket of New Zealand's Tim Seifert.
Ish Sodhi celebrated with a teammate after taking the wicket of Pakistan's Usman Khan.
